website_summaries.verdict: This masculine copper design includes a magnet in each link. It's more comfortable to sleep in than a bangle or cuff.
pros: Stylish copper bracelet with 3,500G magnets in each link for more magnetic effects
Comes in attractive gift bag and box
Designed to reduce pain in hands and wrist
cons: Opening and closing the clasp can be challenging

customer_reviews.title: Working or Mind over Matter
customer_reviews.text: My mother was having problems with arthritis in her hands and I bought her this bracelet thinking what the heck it can't hurt. But she said her hands are feeling better since she has been wearing it. So whether it's the bracelet or "mind over matter" it's working. Also, the bracelet is actually prettier than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Smarter LifeStyle 100% Copper Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and has LOTS of magnetic power and its well distributed. Medical science cannot validate the efficacy of these bracelets, relying on their old fall-back that it must be the "placebo effect" which causes folks wearing these to feel better. Honestly, my arthritis is getting pretty bad so, I'll take any relief wherever I can find it. These types of copper bracelets DO WORK for me at least, and this one in particular is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: oldbaldyvt

customer_reviews.title: If you have hand or arm pain this works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for someone else but she is ecstatic about the response that she has gotten from this in the first 24 hours of wearing. All pain in her hand has gone away and there is a measurable reduction in swelling of the joints in her thumb. She has not taken a single pain medication after 12 hours of wearing this. Remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: bondo

customer_reviews.title: so when receiving this one I immediately put it one and within a day I started feeling extremely better. Many thanks Smarter Lif
customer_reviews.text: So grateful to have received this cooper bracelet! Had one for 3-4 years and never took it off till it recently broke. I was very concerned I would not find another one that was true and could assist with the matters I need them for. I felt an extreme difference after loosing my last one, so when receiving this one I immediately put it one and within a day I started feeling extremely better. Many thanks Smarter LifeStyle for having this available. I will definitely be using your company again!
customer_reviews.author: Renee'

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief and energy boost!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, getting it out of the packaging was very difficult, especially the box design and the plastic wrap around the bracelet. That should be easier especially for people with hand and wrist problems.I like the length so didn't need to alter the links. At first, wearing it caused dizziness and stomach issues. I am really sensitive so this didn't surprise me. I took it off and on periodically for about an hour. Now, I find that it really helps my carpel tunnel and seems to give me an energy boost.. It is also very attractive to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Zina

customer_reviews.title: This works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my ankle and when the weather changes the pain is sometimes unbearable, impossible to sleep. I just received the anklet Saturday. Today is Wednesday. When I'm wearing it, I have close to zero pain. I can definitely tell a difference when I don't have it on. I removed it when I showered last night and forgot to put it back on and last night I had pain in my ankle. When I woke up I realized that I hadn't put it back on. So now it's on and I am feeling much better. I am very happy and will look further into purchasing more magnetic jewelry to help with other pain.
customer_reviews.author: TCal

customer_reviews.title: Healing With Copper Magnetism !
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product with super-duper fast service! Product was well packaged & arrived in perfect condition. A PDF E-Book is available with the purchase & comes in an email after the original purchase arrives. They don’t just “sell” a product.....they “explain” the product, too !! A small instruction sheet for proper care also accompanies the bracelets. They are made of 99.9% copper & are malleable with a slight effort required. I purchased a set to provide one each for my wife & me. I also went ahead & purchased a 2nd set to have for future needs. Enjoy! A++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Machguy

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if these work? Me too. So I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if these work? Me too. So I bought one anklet. I have prolems with my ankles randomly decide to swell and my feet are hyper sensitive and thr ache is is daily sometimes more than others. I dont take meds or anything pain. I have used copper and know its effective so I bought the copper anklet over the titanium and S.S. I have only worn a for a few days but the pain is greatly reduced. I will be buying one for the other ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Drip it or drop it

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a really beautiful piece of jewelry, it also seems to actually help! I wore this bracelet for about 5 days. I noticed my misc aches and pains seemed to slowly lessen. I took it off yesterday for 24 hours and already I am noticing an increase in pain. I think over time it may fix a lot of my pain issues. For those who want to 'try' it. I say do so. I had no adverse effects and I am hopeful that over time it will be a real help. Worst case, it's a lovely piece to wear, even if you get no healing benefit.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAK

customer_reviews.title: Burnish copper
customer_reviews.text: More burnish copper than bright copper. Unisex look, but leans slightly more masculine. Comes with a tool to adjust the size of the bracelet by allowing you to take links off. It was easy to push the pins thru to release the link but tricky to put it back in to reattach. However with patience and a determined hand, it can be done Have worn it for a week and so far, I don’t feel any difference in terms of lessened pain or achiness I have a mild case of tendinitis and carpal tunnel syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: It truly does work. I have been looking for this product for a long time. I'm so happy I found it. I can tell within 24 hours it was working. My feet and knee stop a chin and my foot fatigue is gone. I highly recommend this product to anyone. Placing the order for my second anklet bracelet cuz I wear two wrist bracelets I want to keep myself balanced. I contact the seller seeking additional links and to my surprise they answered my request within 24 hours and they sent me the links that I requested at no additional cost. And I also recommend this seller highly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really works. Outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my son this copper anklet because, like me, he has been experiencing severe heel pain. I've had the women's version of this anklet for over a year and it has given me reliable relief from plantar fasciitis. I wear mine all the time, and have not been bothered with pain at all. The men's version was several links too small for my son. I contacted the seller and they immediately send out several extra links for me to add with the convenient tool that comes packaged with the anklet. Love this anklet and the amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JBW

customer_reviews.title: Great items, will help in relieving some of the unbearable pain!
customer_reviews.text: The copper bracelet and ankle bracelet definitely helped me in relieving some of my excruciating pain from the combination of arthritis, carpal tunnel and osteopenia. I can get better sleep at night and able to deal with the pain that’s left for me to handle in other ways. I’m glad I took a chance and tried your product!!! Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, but it is comfortable and doesn't cause any ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it is working because I started a few treatments for my ankle and knee joint pain at the same time, but something has worked because I completely eliminated my knee pain and reduced my ankle pain. I am also using Black Seed Oil, Highly recommend, but it is comfortable and doesn't cause any discomfort. I weigh 206 pounds and have what I would consider fat legs and normal ankles. It made me nervous that it might be tight, but it is just right. If you have big ankles it probably wouldn't work for you in the women's size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain pain go away, I'll wear my bracelet every day!
customer_reviews.text: The seller perfectly described the bracelet, quickly sent it, and packaged it extremely well, I Haven't had it off since I got it! Instructions for links were great! The clasp was tight at first which was the reason I didn't know how it worked. Need to add instructions for the clasp..I have arthritis in my right hand and this has helped my range of movement...some think that this is just a placebo effect. I don't care if it truly is; it removed the pain from my hand so for all those who have this belief you can go on in pain and I wear my bracelet and let the placebo effect take my pain away.
customer_reviews.author: Debecque

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to a sharp looking anklet that may have added health benefits
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an great looking, yet masculine bracelet I could wear on my ankle. The fact that it is copper and includes magnets were a bonus. I cannot currently vouch for its pain-relief qualities as I wasn’t experiencing ankle pain prior to wearing it. The bracelet is suitable for both sexes, easy to size and remove once I got in the habit of positioning the clasp on the same side each time.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: I believe copper works for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Broke my arm 17 yrs ago and had a lot of arthritic pain, always wear a copper bracelet since then. Recently broke my ankle so I bought this. I had to remove three segments and it fits perfectly. I can't wear it at work and by day 2 my ankle is hurting. On my days off, I put this on and the pain diminishes fully in a few hours. The clasp is very sturdy and will not break.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and High Qualilty
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, high quality bracelet. Does it work ? I came down with tennis elbow and bought this to help heal. After a couple of weeks there was no improvement in the elbow. But I was told to keep using it, as it may take awhile to feel the effects. Eventually, after more that a month, my elbow was starting to feel better, but by this time I was getting physical therapy, and was not using the arm at all. So I'm not sure if it was the bracelet, or the therapy, that helped my elbow.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Way to big and cannot remove links.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty bracelet but it's huge and the links will not come apart. The tool that comes with it is so cheap it just bends. I wanted to like this but I can't use it so it's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: carlene pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The clasp is impossible. The bracelet can not be returned? Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Shattered thumb nails trying to open clasp (updated)
customer_reviews.text: The clasp was impossible to open. I did converse with the seller and they sent me 2 new clasps which would not open either. because I let them try to help me, I can now no longer return the product. Money down the tubes and I do not consider $40 cheap. The company did refund my money - excellent customer service. Very disappointing -- would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beth

customer_reviews.title: Relief is just a bracelet away.
customer_reviews.text: OK, the look is great, gotta love that. More importantly, we have only had it for a couple of days and I can already tell there has been some relief in my wife's right wrist. I have the men's version, and it looks great. I've had it since Father's day, and believe me, it is a gift well received. The arthritic pain is not nearly as bad on my left hand and wrist, even the right hand feels better. Some of the joint pain has been reduced a bit, but then I have just started to exercise again, and these old bones are protesting no matter what. The pool is the best, but my bracelet ranks right up there.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great Bracelets
customer_reviews.text: Look good well made easy to adjust to fit, and believe they will hold up well over time. Matter of fact I ordered another pair of them. Have been wearing this type of bracelet for over a year now because of my arthritis in my fingers and could not even bend them. Don't know if it's the bracelets or it's in my head but now no more pain in my fingers and I can bend them. So I wear them 24/7 even shower with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: This really made a difference! Not only does this bracelet look so nice but it stopped my wrist pain. I have worn this for over six months and it has made a difference. I am a secretary so I am on the computer all day, every day and often experience wrist pain, once I started wearing this the pain left. I did not even realize this helped the pain until I forgot to put it on for a couple of days (I take it off to shower), my wrist began to ache, once I put the bracelet back on my wrist felt better (It was not instant but by the next day I noticed the difference).
customer_reviews.author: MissJilld

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my 80 year old Sister in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 80 year old Sister in law, my 68 year old boyfriend and myself. My Dr said the acupuncture are in your wrists and your ankles. I could not hardly use my thumb. I got these and bracelets, and a ring. i can use my hands equally now these are not a myth they really work. I am going to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Monita Fields

customer_reviews.title: The tool to remove links was easy enough to use once I got the hang of ...
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviews - the clasp is stiff, but overall I was impressed with the quality of the product. The tool to remove links was easy enough to use once I got the hang of it. I suffer from wrist and elbow pain from working on a computer all day. The pain seems to have diminished since using this bracelet. I gave 4 stars beacause after 2 weeks of use, i am seeing some wear on the finish of the links from my constant mouse use at work. The bracelet rubs on my desk (a smooth surface) as I move my mouse, which I believe is causing the wear.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Saaler

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet was only copper coated.
customer_reviews.text: The ad touted that the bracelet is "Elegant Pure Copper Magnetic Therapy Bracelet." After wearing it for over a year I noticed that the copper was wearing off and that the metal under the copper was not infact copper. Also the magnets on the underside were very crudly glued in but as of now none of the magnets have fallen out. It is my hope to get a FULL refund of the sale price plus any taxes and S&H charges.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mahagan

customer_reviews.title: Hasp will not stay closed during normal use
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome for relieving my wife's pain due due a broken wrist. The first one lasted around 18 months and then started to tarnish her wrist. Pretty cheap pain medicine with no side effects. So I ordered her another one because the product really helps her. But the HASP will not stay closed during normal useon this one. We need a new hasp or the bracelet replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Really like the looks of this bracelet and am very happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the looks of this bracelet and am very happy with it - whether or not it actually winds up helping with my arthritis which is pretty far advanced already. The strength in my fingers is not great, so the clasp was difficult at first. The company sent me a new one hoping it would be easier to use, but I've found that the original did indeed become a little easier to open and shut after a few days. I do like that the clasp is very secure - would rather have it a little tight than so loose it opens with any little bump.
customer_reviews.author: A and B Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Falls off. - Update
customer_reviews.text: Bracelet is lovely and fits well, but the clasp simply won't stay closed. It fell completely off several times. I tried to use jewelry pliers to angle the clasp but it was too firm to adjust. Very disappointing. Update - seller replaced it on their own initiative, and the second one stays clasped - I'm happy with the replacement. Bumping it up to 4 stars for the seller reaching out and for the second bracelet staying on.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Antrim

customer_reviews.title: No relief in pain
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made bracelet. It was easy to adjust with the kit that was provided. I was able to wear it day and night without any discomfort. I only removed the bracelet if it would get wet such as showers or swimming. Sadly, I have not noticed much difference in the severe pain in my thumb joint due to arthritis. I will continue to wear the bracelet just because it can be worn as a piece of jewelry or maybe it takes longer to give me some relief. I’m not looking for a cure just some relief from pain. I only gave a four star rating because I noticed no relief in pain.
customer_reviews.author: C Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: This is a scam. Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend who has issues with her joints in her hands. Bracelet was sized snug to her wrist. She wore it for a week straight never taking it off and there was no change. Waste of money. Should of just thrown the $40 in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN BOUTILIER

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bracelet! It is the perfect size for a women’s bracelet & adjusting the band smaller (I removed 4 links) was no trouble at all. The clasp is tight, but would prefer it that way so it does not come undone & fall off, as I wear this bracelet all the time. Very pretty, good quality copper bracelet. My wrist was hurting & now it is not! Has helped my aches & pains! Highly recommend it and seller communication is excellent. My wrist has not turned green or discolored.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine52

customer_reviews.title: Maybe works to some extent but discolors arm.
customer_reviews.text: I do not generally leave poor ratings but in this case I feel it is necessary. Let me start by staying I do think possibly the product did help with some of the issues they claim to help. BUT I don’t believe the item is 100 percent copper. It turned my wife’s arm and my arm both deep green. I have worn copper jewelry in the past and not had this happen. So my rating of 3 is based on the fact that maybe some of their claims might be of some advantage but if you can’t wear it due to the discoloration then it is of little use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Marsha

customer_reviews.title: It's working
customer_reviews.text: This was my last resort to help with my arthritis pain in my wrists and hands. Within in an hour of putting it on, the severity of the pain was diminished like I had not experienced with other methods in the past. While the pain has not totally disappeared, the discomfort has been drastically reduced. So glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to size correctly
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions to take out some links. Broke the included tool and the spare. We’ll see how the refund goes. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oges

customer_reviews.title: Looks good Feels good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality bracelet/anklet. This is what I have been looking for for a long time. I am not a fan of cuff bracelets as are so many of the copper/magnetic bracelets out there. So, when I saw this classy little item I knew I had to have it. Copper and magnets aren't cures for pain, but this bracelet is taking the edge off of the pain. I have put Smarter Life Styles copper rings on my Amazon Wish List. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: ankle came on time in a nice box. it's very stylish and has lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ankle because I have ankle and foot pain and I was hoping for anything that could help. ankle came on time in a nice box. it's very stylish and has lots of little magnets. I've been wearing it for a week and I noticed decreased swelling in my ankle and pain has subsided also. I'm also using dr. sholls inserts and the combo is helping significantly with my problems. I highly recommend this product. my mom is wearing the bracelet and it's helping her with hand pain too.
customer_reviews.author: iwona

customer_reviews.title: This bracelet is definitely worth trying for pain!
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet looks nice on my wrist! I had a small piece of wire deep in my hand for a couple months. The next day after wearing it, I woke up and the wire was sticking out, so I could pull it! I now have worn it for 3 days. I feel improvements in my arthritic hands and knees. My lower back pain is completely gone. Each day I have seen improvements andI feel I will continue to see improvements!
customer_reviews.author: L. Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes of gaining some relief from mounting arthritis. I think this bracelet is well made and of good quality. By the way, the magnets are quite strong. I like it so much I have ordered one of the narrow versions for my wife's birthday this coming February. The bracelet comes with a clever do it yourself link removal tool and the custom box it is packaged in is artfully made and just right for gifting. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: MUGS

customer_reviews.title: Clasp is very hard to open and not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is terrible. I bought it for my 86 year old mother. The clasp is almost impossible to open. I tried almost an hour to take a couple of links out and that proved to be another impossible task. Don’t buy this bracelet because it is not returnable. I wish I would have realized that because I would never have bought something sight unseen that I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hickerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product & customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company is totally amazing! My previous copper/magnet anklet from a different seller just wouldn’t stay closed and I kept losing it. So I ordered this men’s bracelet thinking it would fit my ankle but it was too small. I contacted the seller and he so graciously replied immediately and I had additional links sent to me free of charge within days. I’ve been wearing it for several days and have yet to have it come undone. I highly recommend anyone who suffers from joint pain to try this product from this company. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Copper Magnetic Therapy Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these 1 for me and 1 for hubby. There very nice easy on and offm dont know why people are having problems with the clasp its easy to open and close, as long as you understand that your IQ must be higher then the bracelets lol, only bad thing I can't resize either one as both the resizing link removers broke in 3 seconds, tried to super glue the 2 into 1 and it broke off the bat..... QC needs improvement
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: Truly elegant and helpful
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the purchase of the bracelet and the ring. They look very attractive and I started wearing them for pain in my thumbs. I can't say much about the benefits just yet, since it's only been a second day since I put them on. But it seems to help relieve some pain and that was the whole purpose of buying them. They are fine quality items that I like wearing for more reasons than one. Thank you for selling such good products!
customer_reviews.author: LVS

customer_reviews.title: I wearing it and hoping for the best. I do feel that my ankle is less ...
customer_reviews.text: I wearing it and hoping for the best. I do feel that my ankle is less stiff . It came nicely package almost to well. I had a real hard time getting the plastic off of it. If I had arthritis in my hands it would have been a no go to open in my own . I’ve showered with it and it hasn’t tarnished or turn my skin so that is a plus !
customer_reviews.author: Angela Henegar

customer_reviews.title: Not my imagination...can really feel the magnets...
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely feel the magnets in this bracelet. And the pain in both of my arms is gone in less than a week. I had a small stroke about 2 weeks ago and my left arm feels so much better with the bracelet. And I have my own beliefs about putting magnets on your body and one of those is the possibility of them helping to protect a person from electromagnetic frequencies. Anyway...I bought 2 and really like them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm happy! The bracelet is stylish and not bulky at ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm happy! The bracelet is stylish and not bulky at all. I have small wrists and needed an adjustable option. The tool it comes with to remove links is super easy to use and love that I can actually wear this as one size fits all options slip right off. As for its benefits, it's too early to tell if it's helping yet but I'll post back after a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoLK33

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit once I sized it for my wrist. Not to tight or to loose. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to size. Just make sure your reading the instructions. Hahaha, honestly maybe because I work a Little with making my own jewelry is why if found it so easy. The closer is REALLY tight. I chipped part of my nail the first several times I tried to open it. But no problem to me since I want it secure, cause I'm always working with my hands, I don't have time for long nails any way. If you have a metal nail file you can pry it open to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was quite skeptical of these types of bracelets working for pain....this one proved me wrong. Highly recommend! It’s reduced my pain during the day. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the bracelet for a few weeks now, and not sure if it is doing anything, but the reason I am writing the review is because of the difficulty I have had from the beginning getting it on and off. First of all, it comes tightly wrapped in plastic. For someone with arthritis in my hands, it was almost impossible to get it free from the packaging. The clasp is very difficult to click on and off. Again, for people with arthritis, it is a horrible design. I often times have to have someone help me putting it on and taking it off. The manufacturer should look into a better clasp.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but hard to use
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty bracelets probably useful for pain. My mother often wore copper on her wrists for arthithis. That being said, the latches are extremely hard to open and don't reclose and stay on. I'm very disappointed. I wrote to the sellers and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Gail W Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy clasp. Lost same day given as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Received it on 10 June, gave it to my husband as a gift on 12 June AM, lost on 12 June PM...clasp didn't hold and fell off at some point in the evening. Lost. Didn't even wear it for an entire day. Any recourse?
customer_reviews.author: V. J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great attractive bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and very well made bracelet. Very nice tool they send with it so you can remove links yourself if needed. I had to remove two for the bracelet to fit my wife. I had it done in about 10 minutes and would have taken less time but started with one and then two. Watch the little pins though as they can get away from you very easily. Could not be happier with this purchase. Thanks for a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hanger

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, may help
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive magnetic copper bracelet not difficult to resize. I do think it helps reduce pain in my wrists but it's difficult to tell because I'm in constant pain most of the time. Even if I had not bought it for pain relief, I like the looks. The clasp is very difficult to snap on or off but it gets better in time.
customer_reviews.author: Pup Mom

customer_reviews.title: Upper back pain and hand pain
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! I was having doubts but it works for real. The bracelet is helping my upper back pain and hand pain by 80%. I was taking muscle relaxers but was worried about the long term side effects so I decided to try magnetic solution. This is a must have and it's a nice peace of jewelry. I got so many compliments in the two weeks that wore it. I highly recommend this magnetic bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I saw it and it is beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I cannot review this item at this time...I bought it for my husband for Christmas. He has PMR (polymyalgia rheumatica) and mentioned he wanted to try a copper bracelet. I hope he loves it..I saw it and it is beautiful...Will write my review after he wears it awhile. Thank you for the informative booklet I received....
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Cieplinski

customer_reviews.title: Customer service - AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: While I can’t say for certain that this made the aches in my leg go away I can say I am super satisfied with the service we got. Needed extra links and had them within a week. The anklet is very pretty - so much better than a bangle. I would have given it 5 stars but it is a little heavy so it sits very low on my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: ShortyG

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and so far he has no complaints. He was having ankle pain and I figured I would give this a try and I'm happy I did
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA ZAMORA

customer_reviews.title: Difficult clasp
customer_reviews.text: Have only worn the bracelet for a few days since receiving it. Cannot adv ise as to whether or not it will work. So far the only complaint is the clasp is VERY hard to open and close. I almost sent it back when I could not get it open. Was finally able to open it but it is still very hard to open and close. Will review again after I've worn it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Looks great! Even though it might seem heavy, I forget about having it on. Got it on time from the seller. Guys, this is a great anklet. looks good and actually has a function.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: Solid copper well made. I like it. Its not uncomfortable at all. The clasp can be a little hard to pop open but thats a good thing so its not opening up by itself. I use the edge of my pocket knife to pop it open. Hope it helps with my aching joints
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: copper bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions. Was able to remove two links, the bracelet was a lite big. However, the part that supposed to open so you can use it to close the bracelet would not open. Can't even send it for a refund because took off the links.
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: very nice design copper bracelet
customer_reviews.text: very please with my copper bracelet the quality and design is really nice.and the tool that was sent with it for adjustment was very easy I had no problem at all packaging was with great care and no problem with unwrapping. not my first copper bracelet but first from these sellers very impressed !
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Arachnoid adhesions after back surgery
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from Arachnoid adhesions from three back surgeries. I was experiencing increased feelings of what I can only describe as numbness, loss of feeling, and a burning creepy feeling in my feet! After putting the ankle bracelets, on the next morning I was pleasantly surprised with a decreased experience of these symptoms! And, I have over the last few days been able to move my toes in a fashion that has been unattainable for several years!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H Davis

customer_reviews.title: The copper/magnet combination works to relieve pain
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking bracelet on the wrist.More like a burnished copper color.Was easy to remove a few links with removal tool.But tool needs to be lined up perfectly with pin before trying to remove.The shrink wrap on the entire bracelet was a NIGHTMARE to remove ! Please try a different way to package it.Otherwise I like it.
customer_reviews.author: chistina

customer_reviews.title: This magnetic therapy anklet/bracelet really works.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a paid review. The magnetic therapy anklet/bracelet all works. I got the bracelet. anklet and the necklace for my mother and my mother-in-law. They definitely help to ease the pain, if not stopping the pain completely. I highly recommend anyone to try them out. It 's better than taking pain killer all the time. Great customer service, too, the seller can send out extra links if you need them for free.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife who has fibromyalgia. She has obtained a measure of relief since wearing this on a regular basis. I have no idea how or why, just happy she is feeling some relief. Instructions for removing a link were precise and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: William Lee Carter lll

customer_reviews.title: looks great--feel comfy
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the nicest copper bracelet I have ever purchased. it was worth the extra dollars I have paid in the past. it is a very handsome piece of jewelry. the clasp is especially much improved on ones I have used in the past. they were always coming undone and I would lose the bracelet. I do not think that will happen with this one. I recommend this bracelet to anyone who feel the benefit of wearing a copper bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: virginia sides

customer_reviews.title: DOES IT WORK
customer_reviews.text: IM NOT SURE IF IT DID ANY GOOD. BUT THE ONE WORKS GREAT FOR WHAT I BOUGHT MINE FOR WHICH PAIN IN MY TOES AT NIGHT IN MY LEFT FOOT
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and feel of the pure copper magnetic ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of the pure copper magnetic bracelet. I've been wearing it for three days now and it seems to be having quite a nice effect on me. It was a perfect fit from the box and arrived in a very timely manner. Kudos to the Owners.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed as bracelet was lovely
customer_reviews.text: Could not open the clasp nor could two other people. Apparently, this is not a new problem and the company sent me a new clasp that I had to install. Couldn't open that one, so sent everything back. Very disappointed as bracelet was lovely, but too much stress trying to deal with it. Thank you Amazon for being so easy to make things right.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Delicate pin remover
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is very nice. Heavy and well constructed. It actually looks quite nice on my wrist. My only complaint is about the tool that’s used to remove a link. I had to remove one link and immediately the tool fell apart in four pieces. I was able to get it back together. Very difficult to see the little pin but the tool does work you just have to be very careful with it as it’s rather delicate. That said, I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: not a great find
customer_reviews.text: this item runs very small and the extender that the seller sent was not easy to join and it cost more to have the jewelry dealer to extend it so i just dump it somewhere in the house and forget it. next time i will buy the MEN SIZE.
customer_reviews.author: christie o

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and comes in nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and comes in nice packaging. Good construction and nice weight to it. There is a link remover device along with the bracelet although I didn't need it. The hardest part was getting the plastic saran wrap off of the bracelet. I was fighting with it when I discovered there was a little paper tab that would have worked great if I'd discovered it before I jacked up the saran wrap! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lou

customer_reviews.title: Stopped swelling of my ankle. Live this anklet
customer_reviews.text: I broke my ankle bone. It stayed swollen until I started wearing this on that ankle. It’s large enough it sits right on that ankle bone. I only take it off to shower. NO SWELLING and it no longer hurts.
customer_reviews.author: frankie cross

customer_reviews.title: pure copper magnetic therapy bracelet..good choice
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery (3 days?). I like the look and feel of it... Could feel the magnetic energy surge within the hour... Was a little snug for me. Contacted seller. They got back to me right away. Seller had no problem mailing to me a couple of other links at no charge. Already have a couple of other magnetic bracelets. I like the color and slender fit of this copper one. I plan to buy more from this seller. Smarter LifeStyle is the seller & very cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed as I had hoped it was real copper
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing them about a month now. It helped tremendously. But noticed the last few days that it has turned my arm green. I'm very disappointed as I had hoped it was real copper....
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but impossible-to work on links and clasp.
customer_reviews.text: I think I ordered an ankle bracelet like this and sent it back. They gave directions for opening the clasp but I tried several times with no luck. The tool they give you to remove links. bends. I will be going to a jeweler and pay to have it worked on. I like it enough to keep it. Two stars for the looks. It’s very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: shopamazon2

customer_reviews.title: Nice bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and easy to size with tool that comes with it. Great customer service. I emailed and they helped me out real fast. My hand was hurting and I bought many things to try, so it is hard to tell how much this helped. I have Plantar Fasciitis, so i'm going to try it around my ankle. If it helps I will give it another five stars later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Bracelets work
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a cheap magnetic bracelet that I lost. I had often wondered if it did any good. After about a week or two I started noticing small health and arthritis issues. I decided that maybe it was the bracelet that was doing more than I thought. I ordered this bracelet and after a few days these issues have gone away.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice braclet that appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice braclet that appears to be well made. The delivery was very quick. I had an issue with how the clasp worked. I noticed from the reviews that others did as well. The narrative explanation leaves much to be desired. I suggest a video or a few photos either on the Amazon web site or in the included instructions. It will save buyers some time and frustration. This is the only thing preventing a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore one for a year and a half prior to this one. (a link pin broke). It literally fixed my Achilles tendon pain and swelling. I will not be without one now. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This bracelet is of great quality at an affordable price. It doesn’t tarnish or leave a mark on my skin, I never take it off even to shower. It was easy to adjust the sizing with the tool that it came with. Stylish. Seems to have helped with my joint pains! Great customer service from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: but I like it, and a lot of people have ask ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it only 1 wk, but I like it, and a lot of people have ask me about it. I had to remove 2 links, but with the tool you sent, and directions, it was not hard to do. I ordered it because I have been having a lot of hand, arm, and shoulder aches. "old age I guess". I read where copper would help. So I wanted to try this bracelet. Only time will tell, but it is also attraction to wear. Thanks, fran
customer_reviews.author: FRANCES  MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a myth that copper magnetic will take away your pain. It didn't take my pain away
customer_reviews.author: Sally Chateau

customer_reviews.title: TOO EARLY TO TELL
customer_reviews.text: I have heard about the healing benefits of copper and magnets for years. I finally broke down and bought this one because it had both built in. It is easy to attach and taking out a link was not very hard at all with the right tool (included in the package).
customer_reviews.author: Carey Scott

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Awful. The pin tool broke immediately. I needed to remove 3 links. Managed to get 1 pin out on my own but it took over an hour. I give up. Piece of junk and not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it is pretty and sturdy. These are for my wife. Her arthritis pain is better when she is wearing them and she wears them all the time. Have 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar McLean

customer_reviews.title: voodoo ?
customer_reviews.text: Weird, but I have been getting periodic cortisone shots for my thumb this year. My thumb seems better and it has been almost 3 months since my last shot. I was a skeptic but you can't disregard real results. Let's see how my thumb is a month from now.
customer_reviews.author: Customer since 1999

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is a miracle. I was unable to make a fist with my right hand and was considering surgery on my right foot due to arthritis!! No more pain since I received it as a gift for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and excited to wear it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this bracelet so I thought I'd give it a try because of arthritis in my thumb joint. We're old and the bracelet latch is difficult to open and close. But my daughter said hers was for the first couple of times. Will have one of my grandchildren work with it for me. Great looking and excited to wear it. JSN
customer_reviews.author: j. nord

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and right away it made a difference for me and overall feeling better, mainly my hands My only question is should I get another one and wear 2? I don’t mind that the clasp shuts a little hard because I don’t want it falling off! I will probably buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: As far as how it's helped to relieve my arthritis it has helped a great deal. The bracelet is comfortable to wear and ...
customer_reviews.text: This came wrapped in plastic wrap. It took 15 minutes & much frustration to unwrap it. The tool to remove the links was cheaply made, but after MUCH effort I was able to remove 2 links. As far as how it's helped to relieve my arthritis it has helped a great deal. The bracelet is comfortable to wear and sleep in, which is good because it's difficult to get on and off. Seems to be well made & looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: KD ok

customer_reviews.title: I Love this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I felt something immediately after putting this on, like a boost of energy. I noticed more reps when excercising. My wrist was aching, then i put the bracelet on and it stopped. It is very nice looking and sturdy. Can’t believe it really works. 1 year update. Holding up great and still works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on. I really like the looks so as ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both got these, these are very classy looking. My husband wears his all the time, I had to quit wearing mine. For some reason my arthritis really acted up when I wore it so I i took it off, it even quit after I took it off. I will try it again. My husband has no issues with this bracelet. It looks good on. I really like the looks so as I said I will try again
customer_reviews.author: Irene Balding

customer_reviews.title: Great company to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great! Sent additional links immediately when said it was too small. Still have pain in upper foot area so that is why I gave it a 4, but only wearing it for a week. Not sure how long it suppose to take to start working.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: it is truly beautiful. The enclosed descriptions on the "how to size ...
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is exactly as pictured and referenced. it is truly beautiful. The enclosed descriptions on the "how to size correctly" needs a larger print as we needed to use a magnifying glass to follow the text within. That might be because I am 87 years young.. Because of my arthritis, I have a problem unlatching it, so I just leave it on 24/7..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customeri

customer_reviews.title: So Pleased...Less Pain
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how elegant the bracelet is. I also deeply appreciated how it was wrapped, the packaging, and the small tool included to remove unneeded links. This was a great purchase. And, YES, it has already helped to relieve my RA pain. I would like to have the same bracelet as an anklet; not sure if it's available, but I bet it would help the pain in my toes better. If you have RA, you need to also have this therapy bracelet. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for wrist pain ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought. My mom has not taken them off since I got them for her at Christmas. She has been in pain for so long, we are both amazed at how good she feels now. I have no idea why or how these work, and I absolutely don't care. Love, love, love them.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Some
customer_reviews.text: It seems to help overall feeling better, however my bracelet fell apart, one link came out and I could not figure out the instructions they gave for removing extra links and putting it back together. I had to go to a jeweler and have additional links removed and have the bracelet put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera

product_meta.title: Elegant Pure Copper Magnetic Therapy Bracelet Pain Relief for Arthritis and Carpal Tunnel
feature_bullets: EXTRA STRENGTH MAGNETS (3500 Gauss Each): Don't waste time with weaker magnets. Reduce neuropathy pain, fatigue & muscle tension.
PURE 99.9% COPPER: Not the cheap stuff found in many other bracelets! Enjoy maximum health benefits of solid pure copper in every single link (minus the clasp)

FULL BRACELET DESIGN: More effective than bangles; So stylish no one would even suspect that it's therapeutic! Length: 21cm; Width: 1.2cm; Used for migraines, tennis and golfer's elbow, & tendonitis. Also for sports aches in the neck, shoulders, arms, forearms, wrist, fingers and other joints.

SECURE STEEL CLASP: Clasps made of pure copper become loose and don't function over time (metal is too soft). To avoid this, we use Stainless Steel (for the small SL logo clasp only!) with copper plating to ensure it will always function and STAY on your wrist.

ELEGANT & CONVENIENT: Beautiful velvet gift bag and elegant gift box make a great present for most any occasion (Christmas / Xmas, birthday, anniversary) . Link Removal Tool (Instructions Included!) to adjust size in the comfort of your own home.
